name: A2L Safety Course Resource Manifest
description: Resource manifest for A2L Refrigerant Safety Course - LARK Labs

videos.description: Overview of A2L refrigerant classification and safety requirements

videos.description: Safety procedures for handling mildly flammable A2L refrigerants

videos.title: Leak Detection Systems
videos.description: Installation and testing of A2L leak detection systems

learning_outcomes: Identify A2L refrigerant properties and classifications
Apply proper safety protocols for A2L handling
Install and test leak detection systems
Understand regulatory requirements for A2L systems
Recognize potential hazards and mitigation strategies
